title: Shattered
description: After witnessing the murder of her lover and the heartbreaking loss of their unborn child, Savannah wants to end it all.Then she is given a second chance at love. Sadly, even when life hands you second chances it doesn’t always follow that things will work out the way you want them to.Some lies can just be too painful to move on from.What’s worse than being Broken?Shattered…
author: J.L. Drake
